price: Aba’y hindi! Talagang kung hindi siya tumigil ay talagang hahablot nga Kami sa bumbunan:
arabic: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمۡ يَنتَهِ لَنَسۡفَعَۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: kallā la-in lam yantahi lanasfaʿan bil-nāṣiyati
